name: AI Upscaler Plugin - Enhanced
description: Enhanced AI upscaling plugin with advanced crash prevention, cross-platform compatibility, and extensive device support. Features multiple AI models, hardware acceleration, error handling, and performance optimization. Production-ready with comprehensive diagnostics.
overview:
AI-Powered Video Upscaling Plugin - Enhanced v1.3.6.7

Features:
• Advanced crash prevention system
• 6 AI models for video upscaling
• Cross-platform compatibility (Windows, Linux, macOS)
• Smart TV support (Chromecast, Apple TV, Roku, etc.)
• Hardware acceleration auto-detection
• Error handling and auto-recovery
• Performance monitoring and optimization
• Production-ready with comprehensive diagnostics

versions.changelog: v1.3.6.7: Enhanced with crash prevention system, advanced error handling, cross-platform compatibility, device-specific optimizations, hardware acceleration support, performance monitoring, auto-recovery features, comprehensive diagnostics, production-ready stability
